mapper.select: SELECT find_book_view.BOOK_CODE, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_WRITER, BOOK_PUB, BOOK_YEAR, book_info.BOOK_BORROW_AVAILABLE, book_info.book_intro, book_info.BOOK_INFO_ATTACHED_FILE_NAME, BOOK_CATE_NAME, BOOK_MID_CATE_NAME, book_info.BOOK_REGDATE FROM find_book_view INNER JOIN book_info ON find_book_view.BOOK_CODE = book_info.BOOK_CODE ORDER by book_info.BOOK_BORROW_CNT desc LIMIT 37;
